Title: Mary Elaine Califf
Body: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0 Date: Monday, 06-Jan-97 19:42:05 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 922 Last-Modified: Monday, 27-Feb-95 19:40:46 GMT Mary Elaine Califf Mary Elaine Califf Machine Learning Research Group University of Texas at Austin Research My current research interests are in using machine learning, especially inductive logic programming (ILP), for natural language acquisition.
